timeline.message: OC-535 ~ Adds initial changes for Netty library update in PA OSLP

OC-535 ~ Updates Netty in protocol adapter IEC61850

Moves DisposableNioEventLoopGroup to shared
OC-535 ~ Removes unused netty dependency from protocol adapter IEC60870
OC-535 ~ Adds DisposableNioEventLoopGroup class in shared
OC-535 ~ Makes IEC61850 channel handler sharable
OC-535 ~ Updates netty in dlms protocol adapter
OC-535 ~ Resolves some warnings in OslpDecoder
OC-535 ~ Updates netty in super pom

timeline.bodyText: Make the "logger" logger private static final and rename it to comply with the format "LOG(?:GER)?".
timeline.author: jenkins-ip-10-4-24-184

timeline.bodyText: The Cyclomatic Complexity of this method "isOslpResponse" is 22 which is greater than 10 authorized.
timeline.author: jenkins-ip-10-4-24-184

timeline.bodyText: Reduce the number of conditional operators (21) used in the expression (maximum allowed 3).
timeline.author: jenkins-ip-10-4-24-184

timeline.message: OC-535 ~ Updates parent pom for protocol adapter DLMS to use super pom.
OC-535 ~ Removes superfluous field and import from OslpChannelHandler.
